#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
#define INF 1<<28
#define LL long long
int main()
{
        int tst;
        scanf("%d",&tst);
        while(tst--) {
                int N,mini=INF;
                LL sum=0;
                scanf("%d",&N);
                vector<int>vecc(N);
                for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
                        scanf("%d",&vecc[i]);
                        sum+=vecc[i];
                        mini=min(mini,vecc[i]);
                }
                sort(vecc.begin(),vecc.end());
                if(sum==mini) {
                        printf("YES\n");
                        continue;
                }
                sum=0;
                bool flag=false;
                for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
                        if(vecc[i]-sum<=1) {
                                sum+=vecc[i];
                        } else flag=true;
                }
                if(flag)printf("NO\n");
                else printf("YES\n");
        }
        return 0;
}
